Conjuration 3

Herd of Buffaloes

Various nations(14)

Ritual
N2
spell id [id]: 748
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 3009
number of effects [nreff]: 505
gems required [gemcost]: 10N
Summon Units:#3009 Buffalo x 5+[1/2 lvl]
Restricted to Realm:8
This ritual summons a herd of buffaloes and makes them loyal to the caster. Buffaloes are strong and fierce and can be quite aggressive when they perceive a threat to their herd. Buffaloes are held in high esteem in the ancient lands of Ur, but there are other cultures that also revere their great strength.
